and hope <S%G1680><s%> does not disappoint, <S%G2617><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has been poured <S%G7062><s%> out within <S%G1722><s%> our hearts <S%G2588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> who was given <S%G1325><s%> to us.
For while we were still <S%G2089><s%> helpless, <S%G772><s%> at the right <S%G2540><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for the ungodly. <S%G765><s%>

For one <S%G5100><s%> will hardly <S%G3433><s%> die <S%G599><s%> for a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man; <S%G1342><s%> though <S%G1063><s%> perhaps <S%G5029><s%> for the good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G18><s%> someone <S%G5100><s%> would dare <S%G5111><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to die. <S%G599><s%>

But God <S%G2316><s%> demonstrates <S%G4921><s%> His own <S%G1438><s%> love <S%G26><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> us, in that while we were yet <S%G2089><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for us.

Much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> having now <S%G3568><s%> been justified <S%G1344><s%> by His blood, <S%G129><s%> we shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> from the wrath <S%G3709><s%> [of God] through <S%G1223><s%> Him.

for until <S%G891><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> was in the world; <S%G2889><s%> but sin <S%G266><s%> is not imputed <S%G1677><s%> when there is no <S%G3361><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> from Adam <S%G76><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who had not sinned <S%G264><s%> in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of the offense <S%G3847><s%> of Adam, <S%G76><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is a type <S%G5179><s%> of Him who was to come. <S%G3195><s%>

But the free <S%G5486><s%> gift <S%G5486><s%> is not like <S%G5613><s%> the transgression. <S%G3900><s%> For if <S%G1487><s%> by the transgression <S%G3900><s%> of the one <S%G1520><s%> the many <S%G4183><s%> died, <S%G599><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> did the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and the gift <S%G1431><s%> by the grace <S%G5485><s%> of the one <S%G1520><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> to the many. <S%G4183><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> by the transgression <S%G3900><s%> of the one, <S%G1520><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the one, <S%G1520><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who receive <S%G2983><s%> the abundance <S%G4050><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%> and of the gift <S%G1431><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> will reign <S%G936><s%> in life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the One, <S%G1520><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
